everyclass.is_chinese_char(uchar)[source]¶

Check if a char is a Chinese character. It’s used to check whether a string is a name.

Parameters:uchar – char
Returns:True or False

everyclass.semester_code(xq)[source]¶

获取用于数据表命名的学期，输入(2016,2017,2)，输出16_17_2

Parameters:xq – tuple (2016,2017,2)
Returns:str 16_17_2
everyclass.string_semester(xq, simplify=False)[source]¶

因为to_string的参数一定来自程序内部，所以不检查有效性

Parameters:
  • xq – tuple or list, like [2016,2017,2]
  • simplify – True if you want short str
Returns:

str like ‘16-17-2’ if simplify==True, ‘2016-2017-2’ is simplify==False
everyclass.tuple_semester(xq)[source]¶

Convert a string like “2016-2017-2” to a tuple like [2016,2017,2]. xq may come from a form posted by user, so we NEED to check if is valid.

Parameters:xq – str”2016-2017-2”
Returns:[2016,2017,2]
